Articles.Content:
Life Support Resource Converter

By: Colin Votier @ Chroma Works

Currently compatible with TAC LS but feel free to reconfigure to support what you need. The PSD for the texture is included below.

Feel free to re-share this, and derivatives of, just link back to here.

Requires TAC Life Support by TaranisElsu

Download

Source
Cool looking part, just have a typo on it. "Scruber" should be "Scrubber".
So... what does it do? Make oxygen and look cool?
Looks amazing. A bit limited though, as you can only place it at the end of a stack. A radial version would be awesome.

Looks amazing. A bit limited though, as you can only place it at the end of a stack. A radial version would be awesome.

I'll be making a radial and linear version (top+bottom) shortly. For now the attachment rules and collision mesh do allow for both with a bit of fudging about.

As for the typo... It was late. Lol. I'll fix it soon.

Maybe you poste it in the TAC LS-Threat.

He has there a list with links to additional parts going on. So that more people can use this wonderful part...

Looks amazing. A bit limited though, as you can only place it at the end of a stack. A radial version would be awesome.

+1 radial version would be pretty nice.

I have made some alternate textures for this that are matching with asmi's eclss lifesupport mod and changed the text on it to read "RDX-2 O2 REGENERATOR" With your permission i would like to submit them to asmi if he wants to use it in his mod. Also made a working part file for it.

I would like to try those out, you should post them on LifeSupport Thread. The License for converter allows anyone to use them.

I have made some alternate textures for this that are matching with asmi's eclss lifesupport mod and changed the text on it to read "RDX-2 O2 REGENERATOR" With your permission i would like to submit them to asmi if he wants to use it in his mod. Also made a working part file for it.

Is this dead? I like the look of this a lot and tbh would hugely appreciate some better looking parts for TAC-LS.

Keep up the good work....please lol

---THREAD CLOSED---

I haven't maintained this thread/mod because official ls converters were released for the TAC LS mod. Feel free to use their plugin/config with my models.
